text: Ra madayanatira unako bha'i ‘‘su'aibala'i’’ pathayaum, ta unale bhaneh ‘‘he mero samudaya! Allahakai upasana gara, usa baheka aru kohi satya pujaniya chaina. Ra napa taulama pani kami nagara. Maile ta timila'i samrd'dha dekhdachu ra mala'i timro barema e'uta yasto dinako sajayako bhaya cha juna timila'i a'era gherihalcha.’’
